description.english: Finish at least once "Prisoner of war"
Finish a mission with an captured enemy
Finish a mission by destroying the Anti-aircraft battery
Finish a mission without kill an enemy
Finish a mission without be spotted
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100%
Finish "Spec Ops" with 3 tasks and a global scoring of 100%
Finish "Spec Ops" with 2 tasks without be spotted, without kill and without dead
Finish "Spec Ops" with 5 tasks and a global scoring of 100%
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% alone on a large or very large map
Finish a mission against the dark army
Finish a mission with 3 captured enemies
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 100 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 300 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 500 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 1000 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 5000 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 10000 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 20000 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 50000 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 100000 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 200000 XP
Finish a mission with a global scoring of 100% and 500000 XP
Collect "Chef de Guerre" in Valenwood villa
Collect "Objectif: Forces speciales" in Burnwood mansion
Collect "Confessions d'un Ops" in Elegance airport
Collect "BRI: Les formes de l'ombre" in Central hospital
Spot all enemies in a area
Secure a area by eliminating all enemies
Eliminate the meeting and steal the briefcase
Defuse a nuclear bomb before the end of the countdown
Put a listening device without being spotted
Finish at least once a mission
Play at least once training mode
Play at least once a mission
Use at least once a drone
Control at least once a dog
